Package org.stats

Interface RatingAnalyzer

  • public interface RatingAnalyzer
    Central interface in the proposed JAMS (Java API for Mathematical Statistics) 1.3 specification. Implementations are responsible for providing the mean, median, and mode(s) of an integer dataset.

    The newInstance(int[]) method is used to obtain instances of this interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String IMPLEMENTATION_PROPERTY
      Property specifying fully-qualified implementation classname.
      static String PROPERTIES_FILENAME
      Classpath-relative name of properties file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double mean()
      Computes (if needed) and returns the arithmetic mean of this analyzer's dataset.
      double median()
      Computes (if needed) and returns the median value in this analyzer's dataset.
      int[] mode()
      The mode(s) of this analyzer's dataset.
      static RatingAnalyzer newInstance​(int[] ratings)
      Factory method creates and returns an instance of an implementation of this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • mean

        double mean()
        Computes (if needed) and returns the arithmetic mean of this analyzer's dataset.
        Returns:
        Arithmetic mean of this analyzer's dataset.

      • median

        double median()
        Computes (if needed) and returns the median value in this analyzer's dataset.
        Returns:
        Median value of this analyzer's dataset.

      • mode

        int[] mode()
        The mode(s) of this analyzer's dataset. Every dataset has at least one mode. Examples below:

        Example datasets and modes
        DatasetMode(s)
        2, 5, 2, 3, 1, 4, 5, 22
        2, 5, 2, 3, 1, 5, 5, 22, 5
        3, 8, 23, 8, 2
        33

        Note: For a multi-modal result, the mode values are returned in ascending order.

        Returns:
        Mode(s) of this analyzer's dataset.

      • newInstance

        static RatingAnalyzer newInstance​(int[] ratings)
                           throws AnalyzerConfigurationException
        Factory method creates and returns an instance of an implementation of this interface.

        Implementation notes for providers:

        • The implementation class must be a public class that implements this RatingAnalyzer interface.

        • It must have a public constructor that accepts the ratings as a parameter of type int[].

          For example: 

             public RatingAnalyzerImpl(int[] ratings) throws IllegalArgumentException {
       ...
   }

        • This constructor must throw IllegalArgumentException if the ratings array is null or empty. If that occurs, this newInstance method will wrap that exception in an AnalyzerConfigurationException and throw that.

        • The rating-analyzer.properties file (which must be located on the class path) is used by this method to instantiate the implementation class, and must contain the fully-qualified name of that class. See example file provided with this specification.

        Parameters:
        ratings - Data to analyze.
        Returns:
        Instance of RatingAnalyzer implementation class.
        Throws:
        AnalyzerConfigurationException - If a problem is found in configuration.
